io.artframework

Interface ActionContext<TTarget>

  • Type Parameters:
    TTarget - type of the target
    All Superinterfaces:
    Action<TTarget>, ActionHolder, ArtObject, ArtObjectContext<Action<TTarget>>, Context, RequirementHolder, ResultCreator, Scoped, TargetHolder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultActionContext

    public interface ActionContext<TTarget>
extends Action<TTarget>, ArtObjectContext<Action<TTarget>>, RequirementHolder, ActionHolder
    The 
    ActionContext
    wraps the actual Action and handles the execution logic of the action.

      • execute

      • execute

        FutureResult execute(@NonNull
                     @NonNull Target<TTarget> target,
                     @NonNull
                     @NonNull ExecutionContext<ActionContext<TTarget>> context)
        Description copied from interface: Action
        Called when the action is executed. The action should handle the pure execution and no filtering. All filtering is done beforehand and by the means of attached Requirements. Use the @ConfigOption annotation on fields of this class to provide configuration options for users of this action.

        Make sure to annotate this Action with a @ART and optionally provide a config class and implement Configurable.

        Specified by:
        execute in interface Action<TTarget>
        Parameters:
        target - the target of this action
        context - context of this action. Use the ExecutionContext to retrieve the config and a lot of additional information about the execution.
        Returns:
        the result of the action execution. Use the ResultCreator.success(String...) and ResultCreator.failure(String...) methods to create the result.
